title: Breach of Contract
text: A breach of contract occurs when one party fails to perform their obligations under the contract.

title: Remedies for Breach of Contract
text: Remedies for breach of contract may include monetary damages, specific performance, or rescission.

question: What should I do if the other party breaches the contract?
answer: If the other party breaches the contract, you should...

question: How can I resolve a contract dispute?
answer: Contract disputes can be resolved through negotiation, mediation, arbitration, or litigation.

question: A vendor I hired isn't fulfilling their contract. What are my options?
